title: Draft pick
body: During the draft pick, the other summoners picks are not enough marked, neither visually nor with audio, imho. Yesterday I barely notice my opponents and allies had already picked. I suggest to make not only our pick to shout the Champion Selection Quote, but also the others summoners' ones, like it was in the old draft at the start of the Season 6, and now happens during the ban phase. It's really scenographic, neat and clean. What you others think?
